Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is an alternative for future energy conversion systems with great potential.
Titulo: A novel flow field design with flow re-distribution for advanced thermal management in Solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Long-term operation in SOFC mainly obstructs its further development.
Titulo: A novel flow field design with flow re-distribution for advanced thermal management in Solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Stratification and fission can be occurred in Positive electrolyte negative (PEN) structure by severe thermal stress.
Titulo: A novel flow field design with flow re-distribution for advanced thermal management in Solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: By improving the temperature uniformity, localized hot spots and thermal stresses can be eliminated significantly.
Titulo: A novel flow field design with flow re-distribution for advanced thermal management in Solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This study proposed a novel rotary L-type main flow field for SOFC and the thermal and flow characteristics are investigated.
Titulo: A novel flow field design with flow re-distribution for advanced thermal management in Solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The temperature distribution (TD) is estimated by the temperature uniformity index.
Titulo: A novel flow field design with flow re-distribution for advanced thermal management in Solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results show that the temperature uniformity index increased at least by 40%.
Titulo: A novel flow field design with flow re-distribution for advanced thermal management in Solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The largest TG of the rotary L-type flow field is 20% lower than that of co-flow and cross-flow arrangements.
Titulo: A novel flow field design with flow re-distribution for advanced thermal management in Solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The average TG is 32.72% lower than the counter-flow arrangement.
Titulo: A novel flow field design with flow re-distribution for advanced thermal management in Solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This flow field design provides an effective solution for the long-term operation of SOFC.
Titulo: A novel flow field design with flow re-distribution for advanced thermal management in Solid oxide fuel cell
